title: So Help You Pod, or Whatever
description: Aaron wants to move his beloved refurbished egg pod chair into the home he shares with his wife, Kara. Kara objects to the outsized piece of furniture and says it needs to stay in storage until the time and place are right. Who's right? Who's wrong. Only one  man can decide.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
